metadata.title: CVE-2024-56648 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: hsr: avoid potential out-of-bound access in fill_frame_info()syzbot is able to feed a packet with 14 bytes, pretendingit is a vlan one.Since fill_frame_info() is relying on skb->mac_len already,extend the check to cover this case.BUG: KMSAN: uninit-value in fill_frame_info net/hsr/hsr_forward.c:709[inline] BUG: KMSAN:
